title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 16.18 - Payroll and time records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 16.18 - Payroll and time records

State Regulations

State departments, institutions and other agencies shall
maintain adequate time and personnel records in support of payrolls for
inspection by the Comptroller. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
16.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
